August 10, 2012

New Art Directed Article on Style

I'm going thru this list of articles that I once published on this very site and now republishing them on timlikestowrite.com. This particular one, I wrote back in March of 2011. I'm trying not to edit them because I 2011 Tim to shine through and let me tell you, he sounds horrible. Either way, it's fun to read over things I wrote a long time ago. It's a great to see how much has changed in the way I think and lessons I've learned. Anyway, go check it out!
